page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: The Christian Faith has played an important part in the area since earliest times.The Welsh word "Llan" means"Church"and is a common prefix to many places, e.g."Llanynys" in our case. Normano-English gentry established most Churches in the area during the 13-17th C.The 18th C.saw the rapid adoption of Nonconformity by the common people accentuated by the Tithe Wars of the latter 19th c. Rhewl chapel was built in 1844 and rebuilt in 1926.It is unusual in having cinema-style seating. Llanynys Church is restored 16C;displaying particularly beautiful stained glass. Both conduct bilingual services,mainly Welsh at the chapel.
